member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_OUTPUT_METADATA.EncodeErrorFlags
member.summary: A UINT64 representing a bitwise OR combination of values from the enumeration specifying information about the encode execution status.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_OUTPUT_METADATA.EncodeStats
member.summary: A representing statistics for an EncodeFrame operation.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_OUTPUT_METADATA.EncodedBitstreamWrittenBytesCount
member.summary: Output field that receives a UINT64 indicating how many bytes were into plus the value of .

summary.para: Output field that receives a UINT64 indicating the number of subregions used to encode the current frame.

This value is coherent with the settings specified in . If a number of subregions was specified, WrittenSubregionsCount should match that value. If another mode was used, this field is how the driver reports the final number of subregions. If the output is a full frame, then there is only 1 subregion.
